title: italian steak
directions: trim fat off steaks and cut into smaller pieces
dip steak in egg and then bread crumb/parmesan cheese mixture
brown on both sides in 2 Tbsp oil
saute onion in remining 2 Tbsp oil about 3 minutes
stir in tomato sauce, water, seasonings and bring to a boil
reduce heat and simmer 10 minutes, stirring occasionally
arrange steaks in a shallow baking dish, cover with 3/4 sauce, spread with shredded cheese, cover with remaining sauce
